topicTitle: Can I get some ads? Please? =)

posts.postText:
yea, the CS:S server has been fixed up and I would like people to know about it.. Since most play on TTT (As I do) I thought a chat ad once a while will help me get the server traffic up.

Here is a few examples of what some advertisements could look like:

 Hey, why not play on NNJG's **official** Counter Strike server? 69.197.191.226:27015 
 Got CS:S? Can't find a good server? How bout NNJG's **official** Counter Strike server? 69.197.191.226:27015 

Thanks!
I'm Dumdadumdoo and I approve of this message.

>> I'm Dumdadumdoo and I approve of this message. 

Lol ok?
Can I ask abou the status of this?

I say No,
We generally don't post or encourage people to go to other servers when on TTT, and I suggest we keep it that way.
Chat ads would just annoy people.
If they cared about [NNJG] and CS:S, they could find it on their own.
People don't even read that text ;-;

Yea ok... I guess:

 *hint* yes I made it... *hint* 
 http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/5706/deniedd.png

We generally don't post or encourage people to go to other servers when on TTT, and I suggest we keep it that way.
Chat ads would just annoy people.
If they cared about [NNJG] and CS:S, they could find it on their own.
